aws-athena:copy-on-write:v2.notes: Copy-on-write is the default write mode, but any MERGE or DELETE operation uses merge-on-read regardless of table properties
caveats: MERGE and DELETE always use merge-on-read
Table write.delete.mode and write.update.mode properties are ignored for these operations

caveats: VACUUM combines snapshot expiry and orphan file removal

aws-managed-flink:copy-on-write:v3.notes: Amazon Managed Flink has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
